summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 11 December to end of Monday 13 December GMT
description: A dry start to Saturday, becoming rainy during the afternoon.  The continuing Atlantic breeze should ensure good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/>Breezy and unsettled with further rain over Sunday and Monday.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
